instruction: Analyse the theme of a passage.
input: The years passed and I watched as more and more of the world around me changed. Everywhere I looked the landscape was shifting and a new era was coming.
output: The theme of the passage is change and evolution. It speaks of a new era coming into existence as the years pass, with a new landscape being shaped. The speaker is taking note of the transitions and understands that it is a part of life.
